name: The Human Condition
description:
'The Human Condition' is a short experimental game where you don't have to do anything, but you definitely can. As a human, you have the power of transformation. Use it as you wish.

Instructions

There is a text file with the controls inside the game folder. You can move with WASD/arrow keys, jump with space, interact with the left mouse button and drag to move objects around.

There is also a text file with tips if you are frustrated or truly clueless on how to play.
